synopsis.text:
Confucian Sword Immortal, Nujian Immortal, and Lone Sword Immortal were once obscure figures in an era teeming with budding talents, an era unparalleled in history. This is the backdrop of our tale, set twenty years before the events of 'Youths and the Golden Coffin' and 'Shaonian Ge Xing'.

At the heart of our story is Baili Dongjun, a beloved figure and the sole grandson of the prestigious Zhenxihou mansion. Despite his lineage - a father with unrivaled martial arts skills and a mother from the esteemed Wen family - Baili Dongjun's true passion lies not in combat, but in the art of winemaking.

A decade into honing his craft, Baili Dongjun becomes a master vintner. With a stolen land deed and dreams of his own wine shop, he embarks on a journey to Chaisang City. However, the path is fraught with danger, and he unwittingly becomes entangled in a feud between two powerful families.

Along his journey, Baili Dongjun crosses paths with Sikong Changfeng, a vagrant navigating life without parents, and Lei Mengsha, the son of Zhuo Mo. United by mutual gratitude, Baili Dongjun vows to aid Lei Mengsha in rescuing his dear friend, Gu Jianmen, who is held captive in his own mansion.

This is a tale of youth, ambition, and camaraderie, a tale that unfolds in an era brimming with promising young talents, an era that would eventually witness the rise of Baili Dongjun to the pinnacle of the
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
